mapper.select: SELECT book_id as bookId, progress_id as progressId, progress_created_time FROM ( SELECT abi.book_id as book_id, bpi.progress_id as progress_id FROM account_book_index abi INNER JOIN book_progress_index bpi ON abi.book_id = bpi.book_id WHERE abi.account_id = #{accountId}) res LEFT JOIN general_reading_progress grp ON res.progress_id = grp.id ORDER BY progress_created_time DESC LIMIT 5
